thread.title: Miley & Flaming Lips Plan To Perform Bare For A Forthcoming Video
thread.title_full: Miley & Flaming Lips Plan To Perform Bare For A Forthcoming Video

title: Miley & Flaming Lips Plan To Perform Bare For A Forthcoming Video
text:
Miley & Flaming Lips Plan To Perform Bare For A Forthcoming Video Written by: Chaitra K Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 17:08 [IST] 
The former Disney star turned Singer and Musician is supposedly planning to perform naked with the Flaming Lips before a naked audience! 
The Flaming Lips front man Wayne Coyne posted a split picture on Instagram that depicts Miley Cyrus and the band members nude. 
Wayne captioned it as, "Oh, fuck ... !! Miley Cyrus is planning a show where her, the band (us) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk (well, white stuff that looks like milk) is being being [sic] spewed everywhere." 
Image Courtesy: Instagram 
To make sound even more eerie he added, "It's a video (in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song, 'The Milky Milky Milk.'' 
Miley is known for her eccentricity. The Wrecking Ball singer had caused enough storm already when she stripped for her video . 
She got a tad bit more crazy by the year or different rather, and went on to touch herself during a concert. 
The Hannah Montana star hardly had any fabric on her body during the VMAs. She also hosted the award show and performed for her song 'Dooo It'. 
The audience was definitely taken aback by the glittery mess leaking from her mouth, which is the cover of her next album. Now, our dear Miley is planning to spread white stuff, which is believed to be milk, on her naked audience while performing with the Flaming Lips. 
Miley has had a dramatic transformation in the past few years, in terms of appearance and sexuality. 
Post her breakup with her ex-beau Liam Hemsworth, she was dating her ex Stella Maxwell who is a Victoria's Secret Angel. 
Rumours hold that the 'we can't stop' singer has a secret affair with the 43 years old Comedian Dane Cook. Miley had herself expressed that she's into men with good sense of humour. 
Well, we do find Dane Cook very funny. Do you, too, Miley?
